title: encoding/json: need to clarify case sensitivity on Unmarshal documentation?
body:
go version go1.4.2 linux/amd64

According to the documentation for json.Unmarshal:

"To unmarshal JSON into a struct, Unmarshal matches incoming object keys to the keys used by Marshal (either the struct field name or its tag), _preferring an exact match_ but also accepting a case-insensitive match."

However  the library will use the last instance of the field.

http://play.golang.org/p/LtwChO_tp0
